Package org.zaproxy.zap.authentication

Class UsernamePasswordAuthenticationCredentials

java.lang.Object
org.zaproxy.zap.authentication.TotpAuthenticationCredentials
org.zaproxy.zap.authentication.UsernamePasswordAuthenticationCredentials
All Implemented Interfaces:
AuthenticationCredentials
public class UsernamePasswordAuthenticationCredentials extends TotpAuthenticationCredentials
The credentials implementation for use in systems that require a username and password combination for authentication.

    • UsernamePasswordAuthenticationCredentials

      public UsernamePasswordAuthenticationCredentials(String username, String password, boolean enableTotp)
      Creates the credentials enabling or not TOTP.
      Parameters:
      username - the name of the user.
      password - the password of the user.
      enableTotp - true if TOTP should be enabled, false otherwise.
      Since:
      2.16.1

    • encode

      public String encode(String parentStringSeparator)
      Description copied from interface: AuthenticationCredentials
      Encodes the Credentials in a String. Fields that contain strings should not contain the parentFieldSeparator. Should be consistent with AuthenticationCredentials.decode(String).
      Parameters:
      parentStringSeparator - the parent field separator
      Returns:
      the string

    • decode

      public void decode(String encodedCredentials)
      Description copied from interface: AuthenticationCredentials
      Decodes the internal values of the Authentication Credentials from an encoded string and fills in the current object. The string provided as input should have been obtained through calls to AuthenticationCredentials.encode(String).
      Parameters:
      encodedCredentials - the encoded credentials
